channel.title: tomorrow I'll undergo several nose surgeries
channel.description:
after 4 years of suffering "severe headaches, problem in breathing, general fatigue and never ending inflammations in my middle ear and throat" finally I'll do about 4 operations on my nose, that includes a rhinoplasty...so wish me luck folks ;D
damn am nervous about it
here are some pics of my "current" condition, hopefully after I recover I'll post the results
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)

item.title: tomorrow I'll undergo several nose surgeries
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
Be thankful, my housemate has had metal plates in his face to adjust his jaw, he recently had an operation to take two plates out.

He had blood coming from his tear ducts. There aren’t any more manly tears than that :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: tomorrow I'll undergo several nose surgeries
item.dc:creator: Shadi
item.description:
you sure ? am still recovering and my face is pretty much swollen

my operation was called : Septorihinoplasty

edit : dude you don’t get results right away, I have to wait a couple of months to see some good results, but if you insist on seeing a pic here’s one that was taken right after the surgeries, and I was still under anesthesia.

Read full topic

item.title: tomorrow I'll undergo several nose surgeries
item.dc:creator: Shadi
item.description:
oh my god people, who said that I wish horrible things to other people ???

on thread : finally am back home, now I spent 5 days in hospital cause I had some complications and some severe pain, but now I feel better and my look CHANGED ! and it was done a by a VERY VERY skilled surgeon ;D

Read full topic
